ComicInfo.Summary:
Do you believe we are alone in the universe or are there other lifeforms out there waiting for contact? Is the government keeping them a secret from the public? Is it for our own good, or for something far more sinister? Find out the truth here, as we storm this conspiracy head on!
WARNING This series may very well change how you look at life as we know it.
Written by: Hans Rodionoff & Adam F. Goldberg, the producer of TV series you may know such as The Goldbergs, Breaking In, Imaginary Mary, Fanboys and Schooled!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Leonardo Colapietro | 1 | B | Cover B | Igor Vitorino & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Blank Sketch Cover C | None | 3 | D | Subscription Collectible Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Fritz Casas | Missing |
